comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: We should avoid breaking backwards compatibility in jackrabbit-jcr-commons. It would be good to leave at least deprecated dummy subclasses in o.a.j.commons.flat to avoid breaking things.

description: I suggest to move said classes from package org.apache.jackrabbit.commons.flat to package org.apache.jackrabbit.commons.iterator.
summary: Move FilterIterator and SizedIterator from package flat to package iterator
